body_html:
@mathjazz Not sure about the part Make sure the patch is only renaming the file and not touching content., but I assume it’s safer not to touch content in addition to renaming the file.

I don't think you need to call this out explicitly. If they add/remove new strings, they will be added/removed properly. If they modify them, they will be updated.

Nice work!
body:
> @mathjazz Not sure about the part `Make sure the patch is only renaming the file and not touching content.`, but I assume it’s safer not to touch content in addition to renaming the file.

I don't think you need to call this out explicitly. If they add/remove new strings, they will be added/removed properly. If they modify them, they will be updated.

Nice work!
